rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: Large foyer with open space for entry, storage, and circulation. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern facade to maximize morning light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjacent to the kitchen. Features an expansive wall of floor-to-ceiling windows facing south-west to invite natural sunlight and enhance ventilation, with Bohemian decor elements such as colorful textiles and eclectic artwork.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, this space is designed for family meals, incorporating a minimalist design with vibrant accents.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with open layout. Features floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side to capture gentle light while ensuring privacy. Vastu principles incorporated by orienting the cooking area towards the east.

rooms.name: Home Theater Room
rooms.description: Dedicated entertainment zone designed with soundproof walls and dimmable lighting. Windows are strategically placed on the west side to control glare while still allowing natural light during early evening hours.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for guests, featuring a balcony or verandah to enhance ventilation and relaxation, with windows oriented according to Vastu norms for energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an en-suite bathroom. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the south side provide ample daylight; interior design reflects Bohemian style with vibrant patterns and textures.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom for the master bedroom, incorporating modern fixtures that follow local standards for water conservation and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Large floor-to-ceiling window to ensure ample morning light and promote a welcoming entrance as per Vastu guidelines.
